content:
Sure, here is the introduction for the article "Understanding Delay Causes in Residential Building Construction in NSW: Expert Advice from a Construction Lawyer" in no more than 150 words:

Building a dream home is an exciting time for any homeowner, but delays in construction can be frustrating and costly. As a homeowner, it's essential to understand the common causes of delays in residential building construction in NSW and how to prevent and manage them. This article aims to provide expert advice from a construction lawyer with over 10 years of experience in construction law in NSW. In this article, we will explore the common reasons that cause delays in residential building construction in NSW, the role of a construction lawyer in managing and resolving construction delays, practical advice and strategies for homeowners to minimise the risk of delays, and different dispute resolution mechanisms available to homeowners, builders, and contractors. Whether you are a homeowner, builder or contractor, this article will provide you with valuable insights to help you navigate the complex world of residential building construction in NSW.
